Why you need a HubSpot alternative today!
Not Just a Chatbot: HubSpot is a CRM with features for marketing, content management, chatbot, & more. Unnecessary, you already use a CRM.
Less Channels: Hubspot chatbot lacks integration with WhatsApp, Telegram, and SMS, limiting its omnichannel capabilities.
No eCommerce Integration: Hubspot chatbot lacks integration with major eCommerce platforms like WooCommerce and Shopify.
Templates: Templates are crucial for business use case applications. Unfortunately, Hubspot has only a few of them.
Limited Customization: Although you can customize your HubSpot chatbot color, icon, & theme,  it limits using custom CSS to modify the bot’s appearance.
Pricing: With HubSpot, you pay for CRM features when you only need a chatbot. It makes sense to switch to BotPenguin, a dedicated chatbot maker.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is HubSpot live chat pricing?
HubSpot's live chat is feature provided in the marketing hub plans. The pricing starts at $50/month. However, if you only require a chatbot, then BotPenguin is a HubSpot alternative with a pro plan of only $50 per annum.
What is HubSpot chatbot alternative?
BotPenguin is a suitable HubSpot alternative that offers more features and flexibility. It allows multi-platform integration across various channels like WhatsApp, Telegram, & more with unlimited chatbots per account.
Is the HubSpot chatbot alternative free?
Yes, BotPenguin is free HubSpot alternative with a free forever plan that offers 2000 monthly messages per account, one agent seat, and one chatbot for any channels (Facebook, Telegram, & WhatsApp).
Is HubSpot Chatbot free to use?
No, HubSpot does not offer a free chatbot. They provide a free trial for their chatbot feature, but it is not available for free.
Does HubSpot have a chatbot?
Yes, HubSpot does have a chatbot feature. However, it lacks integration with platforms like SMS, WhatsApp, Telegram, and landing pages.
